TEXT.TITLE: UAE GOVERNMENT PAPER YIELDS UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: Yields on certificates of deposit issued by the United Arab Emirates Central Bank were unchanged at 6-1/8 pct, the bank said. The yield applies to maturities of one, two, three and six months. REUTER
